# notes

**Instance Property**

The notes associated with the calendar item.

## Declaration

```swift
var notes: String? { get set }
```

## Attaching Notes

- **hasNotes**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has notes.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has notes.
items.name: hasNotes
